snippet: The Nile Project performed as part of Globalfest, the annual world-music showcase, on Sunday night at Webster Hall.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews performances at Globalfest world-music showcase at Webster Hall.
lead_paragraph: The Nile Project performed as part of Globalfest, the annual world-music showcase, on Sunday night at Webster Hall.

headline.print_headline: Worlds and Rhythms Meet, in Euphoric Result
headline.main: Worlds and Rhythms Meet, in Euphoric Result
